summary.span: 提供所有網站導覽資料提供者的通用基底類別，並讓開發人員實作可以與 ASP.NET 網站導覽基礎結構搭配使用之自訂網站導覽資料提供者，以做為 物件的持續性存放區。

span.span: Provides a common base class for all site map data providers, and a way for developers to implement custom site map data providers that can be used with the ASP.NET site map infrastructure as persistent stores for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並類別代表抽象的預設實作類別。The and classes represent the default implementations of the abstract class. 使用名為 Web.sitemap XML 檔案來儲存網站地圖資料。The uses an XML file named Web.sitemap to store site map data. 如需 Web.sitemap 檔的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 網站導覽](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b85a558-1df8-44cf-bea6-62e61bcc8d20)。For more information on about the Web.sitemap file, see [ASP.NET Site Maps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b85a558-1df8-44cf-bea6-62e61bcc8d20). 類別支援的站台的網站導覽提供者階層架構概念，宣告和屬性。The class supports the concept of a site map provider hierarchy, by declaring the and properties. A可以是子系或父系的另一個提供者。A can be a child or parent of another provider. 這可讓擁有或藉由維護自己的站台對應和網站導覽提供者的開發團隊的站台的不同內容區域的情況。This enables scenarios where different content areas of a site are owned or implemented by different development groups that maintain their own site maps and site map providers. 所有Web.config 檔中用來設定物件。All objects are configured in the Web.config files. 在這些組態檔中宣告的任何站台對應提供者在執行階段會載入，並用來載入和處理網站巡覽資料。Any site map providers that are declared in these configuration files are loaded at run time and are used to load and process site navigation data. 物件，以便持續追蹤所有的提供者可透過其屬性集合，提供以程式設計方式存取的提供者所管理的瀏覽資料。The object, which keeps track of all the providers that are available to it through its property collection, provides programmatic access to the navigation data that is managed by the providers. 下列程式碼範例示範用來宣告網站導覽提供者在 Web.config 檔案中的格式。The following code example demonstrates the format that is used to declare a site map provider in a Web.config file. ``` ``` 這些提供者所載入的網站瀏覽資料正由其他元件的站台對應基礎結構，例如和控制項，以顯示使用者的網站地圖資訊。The site navigation data that is loaded by these providers is used by other components of the site map infrastructure, such as the and controls, to display site map information for users. 如果您實作您自己的網站導覽提供者，您可以將原始程式檔放在您的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 App_Code 目錄，然後組件將會自動編譯。If you implement your own site map provider, you can place the source file in the App_Code directory of your ASP.NET application, and then the assembly will be compiled automatically. 您也可以在全域組件快取 (GAC)，將您自己的網站導覽提供者，並提供其完整參考的 Web.config 檔案中。You can also place your own site map provider in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC), and provide a fully-qualified reference to it in the Web.config file. 如需有關編譯器服務的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用組件和全域組件快取](~/docs/framework/app-domains/working-with-assemblies-and-the-gac.md)。For more information on compiler services, see [Working with Assemblies and the Global Assembly Cache](~/docs/framework/app-domains/working-with-assemblies-and-the-gac.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何撰寫會實作抽象類別類別。The following code example demonstrates how to write a class that implements the abstract class. 此範例包含只是範例及與它的運作方式的範例文字檔案。This example includes only a sample and a sample text file that works with it. 若要執行範例，您也需要在 Web.config 檔案和.aspx 頁面中的項目。To run the example you also need an entry in the Web.config file and an .aspx page. 您可以找到這些文件中屬性。You can find these in the documentation for the property. 此範例會使用逗號分隔的檔案，遵循一個預期的結構，以便載入網站地圖資訊。The example uses a comma-delimited file that follows an expected structure to load sitemap information. 檔案的第一行表示的網站地圖的根節點，因此接下來幾行的子節點。The first line of the file represents the root node of the sitemap, and subsequent lines are subnodes. 每一個子節點識別其父節點的 URL。Each subnode identifies its parent node by URL. 符合這些準則的檔案的範例如下所示。An example of a file that meets these criteria is shown below. ``` default.aspx,Home,MyCompany Home Page, sale.aspx,Now On Sale,Check Out These Great Deals!,default.aspx catalog.aspx,Online Catalog,Browse Our Many Great Items!,default.aspx ``` `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`提供的所有範例實作屬性和方法。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` provides example implementations of all the properties and methods. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自類別類別必須實作抽象方法。Classes that derive from the class must implement the abstract method. 提供的 URL 可以是虛擬或絕對的 URL。The URL provided can be a virtual or absolute URL. 它也可能會使用相對應用程式的語法，例如 URL `~/apprelativedirectory`。It might also be a URL that uses application-relative syntax, such as `~/apprelativedirectory`. 請確認任何實作方法剖析，並正確地處理相對應用程式的語法。Ensure that any implementation of the method parse and handle application-relative syntax properly. 類別，也就是 ASP.NET 預設網站導覽提供者，會使用的 URL類別維護的各種集合中索引鍵的物件。The class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the URL of a object as a key in the various collections that the classes maintain. 因此，如果提供 URL，它必須是唯一的網站導覽提供者的範圍內。Therefore, if a provides a URL, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 如果未不提供任何 URL，則產生的唯一識別項識別。If no URL is provided, a unique identifier is generated to identify the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法會實作抽象類別中的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class that implements the abstract class. `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`會使用協助程式方法，名為`FindUrl`，以取得目前顯示頁面的 URL物件。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` uses a helper method, named `FindUrl`, to get the URL of the currently displayed page from the object. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不會實際建置網站地圖，而只會準備的狀態物件，若要這樣做。The method does not actually build a site map, it only prepares the state of the object to do so. 預設實作初始化網站導覽提供者從站台瀏覽設定的屬性。The default implementation initializes the property for the site map provider from the site navigation configuration. 衍生自類別可以覆寫方法來初始化任何狀態和從永續性儲存體載入網站導覽資料所需的資源。Classes that derive from the can override the method to initialize any state and resources that are required to load site map data from persistent storage. 例如，如果您的衍生的類別會使用檔案來儲存網站地圖資料，任何的檔案初始化可以進行方法。For example, if your derived class is using files to store site map data, any file initialization can be performed in the method. 如果衍生的類別使用其他類型的資料存放區，例如關聯式資料庫中，可能會執行初始化資料庫連接。If the derived class uses some other type of data store, such as a relational database, initializing a database connection might be performed. 其他屬性，例如檔案名稱或連接字串是由 ASP.NET 組態系統，並且傳遞給方法有其參數。Additional attributes, such as file names or connection strings, are read by the ASP.NET configuration system and passed to the method with its parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以準備 Microsoft Access 資料庫連接。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to prepare a Microsoft Access database connection. 連接字串傳入的物件參數方法。The connection string for the object is passed in the parameter of the method. 在此情況下，由提供者專屬區段中，在 Web.config 檔案中提供的連接字串。In this case, the connection string is provided by the provider-specific section in the Web.config file. 在這裡，`accessSiteMapConnectionString`包含主控網站導覽資料的 Microsoft Access 資料庫的連接字串。Here, `accessSiteMapConnectionString` contains a connection string to a Microsoft Access database that hosts the site map data. ``` ``` 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有類別可實作類別可支援網站導覽提供者階層架構的概念。All classes that implement the class can support the concept of a site map provider hierarchy. 提供者之間的階層式關聯性會維護範圍之外本身的提供者的集合。Any hierarchical relationships between providers are maintained outside the scope of a collection by the providers themselves. 如需功能的提供者階層架構的範例，請參閱。For an example of a functional provider hierarchy, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作會實作抽象類別中的屬性類別。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a class that implements the abstract class. `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`會使用簡單的邏輯來判斷目前的提供者是提供者階層的一部分。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` uses simple logic to determine whether the current provider is part of a provider hierarchy. 如果提供者階層的一部分，它會使用父提供者為其自身的屬性。If the provider is part of a hierarchy, it uses the property for the parent provider as its own. 如果提供者不是階層的一部分，提供者是它自己的根提供者。If the provider is not part of a hierarchy, the provider is its own root provider. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立而不需要實作自訂網站地圖提供者藉由訂閱目前所要求的頁面呈現事件。You can create a representation of the currently requested page without implementing a custom site map provider by subscribing to the event. 訂閱者附加物件，以接收通知時屬性會呼叫，並可傳回自訂而不是預設值，所傳回的物件屬性。Subscribers attach a object to receive notification when the property is called and can return a custom object instead of the default one that is returned by the property. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
